ThingDef.label: extradextrous arm
ThingDef.description: By strengthening the muscles in the entire arm, as well as increasing fine nervous control, the entire performance of the arm is increased.

ThingDef.label: ossified bone saber
ThingDef.description: By creating sharp bone growths that naturally keep themselves unnaturally sharp, we can create an appendage more lethal than any sword.

ThingDef.label: voracious maggot bolter
ThingDef.description: By creating a rapidly growing strain of maggots and adapting them to life in our bodies, we can use them as bullet-like ammunition in our bio-weapons.

ThingDef.label: burrowing razortick cannon
ThingDef.description: The ticks shot by this cannon have a smattering of explosive juices on the tip, followed up by a hard shell. After punching though the intial armor with the explosion, the tick burrows rapidly into the target before dying in a flurry of cuts.

ThingDef.label: high pressure pincer
ThingDef.description: The claws on this limb are made of the toughest chitin, as well as being backed by muscles stronger than most animal jaws. The end result is a pincer that can wrench though any metal to destroy what lies inside.

ThingDef.label: sonic impact mace
ThingDef.description: This limb is created out of a mass of strengthened bone, with an intricate series of holes that serves to amplify sound. The result: a mace that creates a large disorienting sound wave on impact.

ThingDef.label: tri-plated limb
ThingDef.description: In exchange for reducing the manipulative ability of the limb, large amounts of chitin plating are added, allowing the user to parry otherwise deadly blows.
